WELCOME_TEXT: Discover the perfect getaway in the heart of Sottomarina, just steps away from the picturesque historic center of Chioggia. Our modern, bright apartments offer a warm and relaxing atmosphere, perfect for couples, families, and groups of friends. They are the ideal choice for those who want to experience the area freely, surrounded by the sea, culture, and tradition.
ABOUT_US_TEXT: Welcome to our two Casa Dalmazia apartments, located in the heart of Sottomarina — just 300 meters from the beach, 100 meters from the Venetian lagoon, and 800 meters from the historic center of Chioggia. Our fully renovated and beautifully bright property is the perfect place to enjoy a vacation full of relaxation, fun, and culture. Wander through the charming alleys of Chioggia, soak in the vibrant nightlife along the Sottomarina seafront, or savor a delicious local dinner in the picturesque old town. At Casa Dalmazia, everything is within walking distance — no need for transportation, just the freedom to slow down and enjoy the true essence of a carefree holiday.
OUR_ACCOMODATIONS_TEXT: Explore Casa Dalmazia, where comfort and authenticity come together to offer you an unforgettable stay in the beautiful setting of Chioggia and Sottomarina. The names of our apartments are inspired by traditional terms from the local dialect, once commonly used by Chioggia’s fishermen. Sevènte refers to high tide, a natural phenomenon that has always deeply influenced the life of the city and its inhabitants — the same that, as in Venice, can give rise to the famous “acqua alta” in the historic center. Dosàna, on the other hand, refers to low tide, when the water recedes, revealing a unique and evocative landscape of the lagoon.
SEVENTE_CONTENT: Sevènte – Bright third-floor apartment with two terraces. Note: the building has no elevator.
DOSANA_CONTENT: Dosàna – Comfortable ground-floor apartment with access to an outdoor courtyard.
DIGA_TITLE: Beach, water sports, and breakwater strolls
DIGA_TEXT: Enjoy the 5 km long beach, try kitesurfing or windsurfing, or be enchanted by a walk along the breakwater, suspended between the sea and the lagoon.
CENTRO_STORICO_TITLE: Historic center and alleys of Chioggia
CENTRO_STORICO_TEXT: Stroll through the alleys, visit the cathedral and the bell tower with the ancient clock, explore the fish market, and enjoy an aperitif at the traditional bacari.
CHIOGGIA_TITLE: Discover Chioggia with a boat tour
CHIOGGIA_TEXT: Experience the thrill of the Venetian lagoon on boat tours led by knowledgeable locals.
VENEZIA_TITLE: Discover the magic of Venice and its enchanting islands: Murano, Burano, and Torcello
VENEZIA_TEXT: The pier is just a few steps from home, allowing you to easily experience these unique adventures.
